OpenXLSX::XLAppProperties Class Reference

This class is a specialization of the XLAbstractXMLFile, with the purpose of the representing the document app properties in the app.xml file (docProps folder) in the .xlsx package. More...

Detailed Description

This class is a specialization of the XLAbstractXMLFile, with the purpose of the representing the document app properties in the app.xml file (docProps folder) in the .xlsx package.
